news.title: More embarrassing Epstein exchanges to come, says Mandelson
news.summary: The UK's ambassador to the US likens his past association with the convicted paedophile to "an albatross around my neck".

news.title: UK's first 'super-university' to be created as two merge from 2026
news.summary: Universities are facing ongoing financial worries, with the regulator saying other mergers could follow.

news.title: Trump is used to shaking off criticism - but the Epstein story is different
news.summary: While there is no suggestion of criminal wrongdoing by Trump, the political consequences of the Epstein saga on the US president are very real

news.title: Anti-Islamic US biker gang members run security at deadly Gaza aid sites
news.summary: BBC identifies members of Infidels MC gang hired as armed security at US and Israel-backed aid sites.

news.title: See stunning shots of Chappell Roan, Charli XCX and Doja Cat up for music photo award
news.summary: Abbey Road studios' nominees for its Music Photography Awards had 20,000 submissions from 30 countries.

news.title: Contactless card payments could become unlimited
news.summary: Card providers would be allowed to set their own contactless card payment limit, under the regulator's plans.

news.title: Ozempic maker to cut 9,000 jobs as it warns 'knock-off' jabs hit profits
news.summary: The Danish firm, which also produces Wegovy, has warned of increased pressure from "knock-off" drugs.

news.title: TV presenter Jay Blades denies rape charges
news.summary: The TV presenter faces a trial at Shrewsbury Crown Court in September 2027

news.title: US influencer investigated over wild croc wrestling videos
news.summary: Wildlife experts say Mike Holston's actions in Far North Queensland were dangerous and cruel.

news.title: Police should stop logging non-crime hate incidents, watchdog says
news.summary: Sir Andy Cooke says the current legislation puts police officers in an "invidious position".
